comment: Best of the cheapest and under 12 blends :). Yeah it won't make you puke and it even tastes acceptably but that's all, folks! I think that the "loser" JWRL shaws more character.
No miracles here. Pleasant on the nose, but a bit grainy and almost too smooth, to the point of resembling more of Canadian than Scotch.

Cove
Nutmeg
Red Fruits
Stewed Fruit
